meta_description: We are now three weeks into the Biden/Harris administration. Donald Trump is gone. Frankly, he has no authority, and his voice is increasingly irrelevant in the political dialogue that will define our nation.
meta_title: America is exceptional because of its Christian heritage - Washington Times
title: America is exceptional because of its Christian heritage - Washington Times

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
This is a myth. Many of the founding fathers were not believers and almost none of them were the great people we portray them as today. George Washington the character who couldn't tell a lie and hated tyranny is very far removed from the real one who supported tyrannical federal government, slavery, and censorship, and slaughtered his enemies. Others wanted a new monarchy (Hamilton), and some were known crooks (and Ben Franklin probably killed the person whose body was hidden in his basement). The only thing they had in common was that they didn't like King George III. Eventually they did agree on our constitution and checks on government power but only because a few of them fought for it.

The concept of a "Christian nation" is also false. That only happened one time ever, and it was NOT the United States. It was Israel, and even then they were not a good role model.
body_html:
This is a myth. Many of the founding fathers were not believers and almost none of them were the great people we portray them as today. George Washington the character who couldn't tell a lie and hated tyranny is very far removed from the real one who supported tyrannical federal government, slavery, and censorship, and slaughtered his enemies. Others wanted a new monarchy (Hamilton), and some were known crooks (and Ben Franklin probably killed the person whose body was hidden in his basement). The only thing they had in common was that they didn't like King George III. Eventually they did agree on our constitution and checks on government power but only because a few of them fought for it.

The concept of a "Christian nation" is also false. That only happened one time ever, and it was NOT the United States. It was Israel, and even then they were not a good role model.

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.
